24  package org.hibernate.cache.ehcache.internal.util;
25  
26  import java.net.URL;
27  
28  import net.sf.ehcache.Ehcache;
29  import net.sf.ehcache.config.CacheConfiguration;
30  import net.sf.ehcache.config.Configuration;
31  import net.sf.ehcache.config.ConfigurationFactory;
32  import net.sf.ehcache.config.NonstopConfiguration;
33  import net.sf.ehcache.config.TerracottaConfiguration;
34  import net.sf.ehcache.config.TerracottaConfiguration.ValueMode;
35  import net.sf.ehcache.config.TimeoutBehaviorConfiguration.TimeoutBehaviorType;
36  import org.jboss.logging.Logger;
37  
38  import org.hibernate.cache.CacheException;
39  import org.hibernate.cache.ehcache.EhCacheMessageLogger;
40  
41  
42  /**
43   * @author Chris Dennis
44   * @author Abhishek Sanoujam
45   * @author Alex Snaps
46   */
47  public final class HibernateUtil {
48  
49      private static final EhCacheMessageLogger LOG = Logger.getMessageLogger(
50              EhCacheMessageLogger.class,
51              HibernateUtil.class.getName()
52      );
53  
54      private HibernateUtil() {
55      }
56  
57      /**
58       * Create a cache manager configuration from the supplied url, correcting it for Hibernate compatibility.
59       * <p/>
60       * Currently correcting for Hibernate compatibility means simply switching any identity based value modes to serialization.
61       */
62      public static Configuration loadAndCorrectConfiguration(URL url) {
63          Configuration config = ConfigurationFactory.parseConfiguration( url );
64          
65          // EHC-875 / HHH-6576
66   		if ( config == null ) {
67   			return null;
68   		}
69          
70   		if ( config.getDefaultCacheConfiguration() != null
71  				&& config.getDefaultCacheConfiguration().isTerracottaClustered() ) {
72              if ( ValueMode.IDENTITY
73                      .equals( config.getDefaultCacheConfiguration().getTerracottaConfiguration().getValueMode() ) ) {
74                  LOG.incompatibleCacheValueMode();
75                  config.getDefaultCacheConfiguration()
76                          .getTerracottaConfiguration()
77                          .setValueMode( ValueMode.SERIALIZATION.name() );
78              }
79              setupHibernateTimeoutBehavior(
80                      config.getDefaultCacheConfiguration()
81                              .getTerracottaConfiguration()
82                              .getNonstopConfiguration()
83              );
84          }
85  
86          for ( CacheConfiguration cacheConfig : config.getCacheConfigurations().values() ) {
87              if ( cacheConfig.isTerracottaClustered() ) {
88                  if ( ValueMode.IDENTITY.equals( cacheConfig.getTerracottaConfiguration().getValueMode() ) ) {
89                      LOG.incompatibleCacheValueModePerCache( cacheConfig.getName() );
90                      cacheConfig.getTerracottaConfiguration().setValueMode( ValueMode.SERIALIZATION.name() );
91                  }
92                  setupHibernateTimeoutBehavior( cacheConfig.getTerracottaConfiguration().getNonstopConfiguration() );
93              }
94          }
95          return config;
96      }
97  
98      private static void setupHibernateTimeoutBehavior(NonstopConfiguration nonstopConfig) {
99          nonstopConfig.getTimeoutBehavior().setType( TimeoutBehaviorType.EXCEPTION.getTypeName() );
100     }
101 
102     /**
103      * Validates that the supplied Ehcache instance is valid for use as a Hibernate cache.
104      */
105     public static void validateEhcache(Ehcache cache) throws CacheException {
106         CacheConfiguration cacheConfig = cache.getCacheConfiguration();
107 
108         if ( cacheConfig.isTerracottaClustered() ) {
109             TerracottaConfiguration tcConfig = cacheConfig.getTerracottaConfiguration();
110             switch ( tcConfig.getValueMode() ) {
111                 case IDENTITY:
112                     throw new CacheException(
113                             "The clustered Hibernate cache " + cache.getName() + " is using IDENTITY value mode.\n"
114                                     + "Identity value mode cannot be used with Hibernate cache regions."
115                     );
116                 case SERIALIZATION:
117                 default:
118                     // this is the recommended valueMode
119                     break;
120             }
121         }
122     }
123 }
